summary: Kroger is a large American retail company that runs supermarkets and department stores across the United States. Founded in 1883 by Bernard Kroger in Cincinnati, Ohio, it now has over 2,700 grocery stores in 35 states. Kroger also operates manufacturing plants, fuel centers, pharmacies, and medical clinics. It is the biggest supermarket operator in the U.S. and the fifth-largest general retailer. Many of Kroger's employees are unionized, with the United Food and Commercial Workers (UFCW) representing most of them.
title: Kroger
